item.title: In Michael Cohen's testimony against Trump, a possible defense witness emerges
item.description: Michael Cohen testified that lawyer Robert Costello was a ""back channel of communications" for him who could relay messages to Donald Trump via his attorney Rudy Giuliani.

item.title: Cicadas pee from trees. And they urinate a lot, a new study finds.
item.description: Scientists who study such things have found that cicadas urinate in a jet stream because they consume an incredible volume of fluid during their brief time above ground.

item.title: Video shows smugglers testing remote-controlled "narco sub"
item.description: Investigators made the unusual discovery during probes into suspects who were cultivating marijuana under the cover of managing car wash stations.

item.title: Michael Cohen testifies for second day at Trump trial
item.description: On Monday, Michael Cohen testified that former President Donald Trump signed off on plans to reimburse him for a "hush money" payment to Stormy Daniels.

item.title: At least 8 people killed, dozens injured in Florida bus crash
item.description: The crash involved a bus transporting about 53 farm workers and a 2001 Ford Ranger truck, officials said.

item.title: At least 8 killed, dozens injured in Florida bus crash, officials say
item.description: At least eight people were killed and dozens more were injured in a bus crash in Florida's Marion County early Tuesday, officials said. CBS News national correspondent Manuel Bojorquez has more details.

item.title: How wildfire smoke can impact your heart and lungs
item.description: Last year, the worst wildfire season on record in Canada filled skies with a smoky haze. Forecasters predict this year's fire season could be even worse, potentially putting more people at risk of health impacts. CBS News' Anne-Marie Green has more.

item.title: OpenAI reveals latest ChatGPT model
item.description: OpenAI showed off its latest iteration of ChatGPT, GPT-4o, in a livestream presentation on Monday. The update is supposed to be faster and has increased text, voice and vision abilities, including engaging in spoken conversations. Bloomberg News reporter Shirin Ghaffary joined CBS News to talk about the new offer.

item.title: Breaking down Michael Cohen's testimony at Trump trial
item.description: Donald Trump's former personal attorney, Michael Cohen, is back on the stand Tuesday in the former president's New York criminal trial. CBS News legal analyst Rikki Klieman takes a closer look at Cohen's testimony and what it means for the case.

item.title: Inside the key Senate races holding primaries Tuesday
item.description: Voters are headed to the polls Tuesday for contentious U.S. Senate primary races in West Virginia and Maryland. CBS News political reporter Hunter Woodall has more.

item.title: Why you should open a 3-month CD this May
item.description: Short-term CDs offer a lot of big benefits to savers right now. Here's what you should know.

item.title: New York court rejects Trump's appeal of gag order in "hush money" trial
item.description: A New York court rejected former President Donald Trump's bid to lift the gag order limiting what he can say about those involved in his ongoing criminal trial.

item.title: Bumble dating app removes ads mocking celibacy after backlash
item.description: The company released an apology and is offering billboard space to groups advocating for individuals it offended.

item.title: The 5 trendiest finds at Sam's Club in May 2024
item.description: From Memorial Day essentials to a reviewer-loved snack, here are our favorite trending finds at Sam's Club in May.

item.title: Killer whales attack and sink another yacht in Strait of Gibraltar
item.description: An unknown number of orcas managed to sink another sailing yacht near coastal Morocco in the Strait of Gibraltar.

item.title: Huge billboard toppled by storm kills more than a dozen people in India
item.description: A metal billboard bigger than an Olympic swimming pool crumpled onto a gas station in Mumbai, killing at least 14 people and wounding dozens more.

item.title: House speaker defends Trump outside New York trial in GOP show of support
item.description: The Louisiana Republican was the latest congressional Republican to show his support for the former president at his New York trial.

item.title: Woman who fought crocodile to save sister honored by King Charles
item.description: Georgia Laurie will receive the King's Gallantry Medal from King Charles III after saving her sister from a crocodile attack.

item.title: 4 big reasons to open a CD right now
item.description: The benefits of opening a CD aren't waning. Here are four big reasons to open an account right now.

item.title: How to watch the Vancouver Canucks vs. Edmonton Oilers NHL Playoffs game tonight: Game 4 livestream options
item.description: Game 4 of the Vancouver Canucks vs. Edmonton Oilers NHL Playoffs series will be played tonight. Here's how to watch.

item.title: Israeli activists attack Gaza aid convoy as U.N. worker killed in Rafah
item.description: Right-wing Israeli activists in the Wests Bank attack a convoy carrying food to Gaza as a U.N. worker is killed in Rafah.

item.title: CBS News investigation shows impact of election deniers in swing states
item.description: A CBS News investigation found there are nearly 80 officials working in election oversight positions across seven swing states who either don't believe the 2020 election results, refuse to certify the election, have publicly supported the actions taken on January 6 or have pushed election conspiracies.

item.title: Another deadly airstrike hits Rafah as Israeli forces advance
item.description: More than 500,000 people have been displaced, the United Nations says, ahead of a possible large-scale Israeli ground invasion of Rafah. Israeli tanks are on the move, and there was another deadly airstrike last night.

item.title: How to watch Caitlin Clark play in the 2024 WNBA season today: Livestream options, key dates, more
item.description: Keep track of every Indiana Fever game this season and watch Caitlin Clark's WNBA debut today.

item.title: Comedian Desi Lydic talks landing dream job at "The Daily Show"
item.description: Desi Lydic is a writer, producer and Emmy Award-nominated actress who currently serves as one of the hosts of "The Daily Show." She joins "CBS Mornings" to talk about how she landed her "dream job" and what she's learned from having conversations with people all over the country.

item.title: Ex-Trump attorney Michael Cohen testifies at former president's New York criminal trial
item.description: For hours on Monday, former President Donald Trump's one-time attorney Michael Cohen described efforts that prosecutors say were intended to cover up Trump's alleged sexual encounters by paying off the women involved. He claims it was all tied to the 2016 presidential election. Trump has denied the claims.

item.title: Drew Barrymore, Ross Mathews talk Jennifer Connelly interview, new 24/7 livestream portal
item.description: Drew Barrymore and Ross Mathews join "CBS Mornings" for Talk of the Table. Barrymore has a preview clip of her upcoming interview with Jennifer Connelly, where she discusses filming the motorcycle scene with Tom Cruise in "Top Gun: Maverick." Meanwhile, Mathews talks about a portal interactive art installation that features a 24/7 live stream camera and screen linking New York City and Dublin.

item.title: Kate Upton, Hunter McGrady talk impact of Sports Illustrated Swimsuit issue
item.description: Celebrating its 60th anniversary, the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue features industry icons Kate Upton and Hunter McGrady on the cover. They join "CBS Mornings" to talk about the milestone.

item.title: The history behind the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit edition as it marks six decades
item.description: The iconic covers of the legendary Sports Illustrated Swimsuit edition have graced newsstands and influenced generations. Today, the magazine is celebrating a huge milestone â€” the 60th anniversary of its swimsuit edition. Meg Oliver traveled to Florida for a rare behind-the-scenes look at the making of the issue.

item.title: Violent wind, tornadoes and torrential downpours cause widespread destruction
item.description: More severe storms hit parts of the U.S. Monday after weeks of extreme weather. Violent winds and torrential downpours slammed parts of the Gulf coast Monday. In the Midwest, there was another round of tornadoes.
